patterns_discovered.description: Using MUI's sx prop with responsive breakpoints (xs, sm, md, lg) to create mobile-first responsive layouts
Starting with single column layout (xs: '1fr') and progressively adding more columns at larger breakpoints
patterns_discovered.impact: Ensures good UX on mobile devices while leveraging screen space on larger devices
